feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r NPC(NPC) :m Mood(Mood) :g [1,1] : Friendly(Friendly) : Hostile(Hostile) :m Profession(Profession) :g [1,*] : Farmer(Farmer) : Villager(Villager) : Warrior(Warrior) :o HarvestSkills(HarvestSkills) :m Reaping(Reaping) :m Hauling(Hauling) :m Threshing(Threshing)
feature_model.constraints: C1:Warrior or Friendly or ~Farmer C2:Warrior or Friendly or ~Villager C3:~Farmer or HarvestSkills
